overview.title: Company Overview
overview.description: Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., Limited (CATL) is a global leader in new energy innovation technology, dedicated to providing first-class solutions and services for global new energy applications.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide innovative battery solutions for global customers

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become the world's leading battery manufacturer

global.title: Global Presence
global.description: CATL has established a complete global network of R&D, manufacturing, sales, and service.

manufacturing.title: Global Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Production bases established in China, Germany, Hungary, and other locations, achieving global layout.

rd.title: R&D Centers
rd.description: Multiple R&D centers established globally, gathering top talents to drive technological innovation.

sales.title: Sales Network
sales.description: Products sold worldwide, providing power battery solutions for numerous renowned automotive manufacturers.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Development
sustainability.description: Practicing green development, building a better future together

address.title: Address
address.content: No. 2, Xingang Road, Zhangwan Town, Jiaocheng District, Ningde City, Fujian Province

asia.title: Asia
asia.content: China, Japan, Korea, India and other regions

europe.title: Europe
europe.content: Germany, Hungary, France and other regions

america.title: Americas
america.content: United States, Canada and other regions

value.title: Let Time Witness Value
value.desc: Through black technology innovation combining hardware and software, and material mechanisms of internal maintenance and external protection, CATL achieves longer battery life, better long-term performance, and higher economic benefits.

reliability.title: Reliability Brings Peace of Mind
reliability.desc: Five layers of reliability protection from design, testing, materials to production processes and manufacturing procedures ensure each battery is safe, reliable, and durable.

adaptability.title: All-weather Performance
adaptability.desc: Whether in high temperature, extreme cold, or heavy rain, CATL provides comprehensive protection.

service.title: Service Beyond Expectations
service.desc: Providing high-quality after-sales service with rapid response standards and a global service network.

intelligence.title: Intelligence Reveals Details
intelligence.desc: The interconnected intelligent Battery Management System (BMS) makes batteries safer, systems more efficient, and travel more secure.

roadPassenger.title: Road Passenger Solutions
roadPassenger.desc: CATL provides safe, reliable, and durable scenario-based solutions for road passenger transportation, addressing high-frequency usage and high stability requirements.

cityDelivery.title: City Delivery Solutions
cityDelivery.desc: CATL power batteries are adapted for light trucks, light buses, mini trucks, and mini vans, widely used in express delivery, supermarket distribution, fresh food, and other scenarios.

heavyDuty.title: Heavy-duty Transport Solutions
heavyDuty.desc: CATL provides powerful clean power for heavy-duty transport vehicles, meeting the requirements of mining areas, ports, urban short-haul, and construction projects.

roadCleaning.title: Road Cleaning Solutions
roadCleaning.desc: CATL provides customized solutions for different road cleaning vehicle requirements. Battery products feature high safety, long life, and strong environmental adaptability.

construction.title: Construction Machinery Solutions
construction.desc: CATL provides safe, reliable, and durable battery product solutions for construction machinery based on complex working conditions in mining areas and ports.

twoWheeler.title: Two-wheeler Solutions
twoWheeler.desc: CATL provides green, intelligent, and safe solutions for two-wheelers, applied in commuting, food delivery, express delivery, and other scenarios.

marine.title: Marine Solutions
marine.desc: CATL provides safe, reliable, and environmentally friendly solutions for ship electrification, contributing to water ecological civilization construction.

special.title: Special Application Solutions
special.desc: CATL provides green, clean, safe, and reliable product solutions for the electrification development of airport parks and port terminals.
